info.author: Guangming Li
info.description:
What is PyJpegOptim?
=================================================

    PyJpegOptim is a utility for optimizing JPEG files.
    It provides lossless optimization (based on optimizing the Huffman tables) and "lossy" optimization based on setting a maximum quality factor.

Installation
=================================================

    You need to install libjpeg first, To install JpegOptim:

Debian::

    apt-get install libjpeg-dev -y

FreeBSD::

    cd /usr/ports/graphics/jpeg
    make install clean

To install PyJpegOptim::

    pip install pyjpegoptim

How to use it?
=================================================

    Following is a simple example::

        # -*- coding: utf8 -*-
        from pyjpegoptim import JpegOptim
        t = JpegOptim('/tmp/test.jpg', quality=80)
        t.save('/tmp/test_optim.jpg')
        t.close()
info.name: pyjpegoptim
info.summary: a utility for optimizing JPEG files
info.html_description:
What is PyJpegOptim?

PyJpegOptim is a utility for optimizing JPEG files. It provides lossless optimization (based on optimizing the Huffman tables) and “lossy” optimization based on setting a maximum quality factor.

Installation

You need to install libjpeg first, To install JpegOptim:

Debian:

apt-get install libjpeg-dev -y

FreeBSD:

cd /usr/ports/graphics/jpeg
make install clean

To install PyJpegOptim:

pip install pyjpegoptim

How to use it?

Following is a simple example:

# -*- coding: utf8 -*-
from pyjpegoptim import JpegOptim
t = JpegOptim('/tmp/test.jpg', quality=80)
t.save('/tmp/test_optim.jpg')
t.close()
